articles.content: I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here! has wrapped up for another year, and now that they are out of the jungle, the cast have made a WhatsApp group to debrief, dissect and make plans to reunite in s… [+1529 chars]

articles.author: Edward Helmore
articles.title: Royal troubles cast shadow over William and Kate’s US tour - The Guardian
articles.description: Carefully scripted trip had to contend with racism row and sympathy for Meghan
articles.content:
The Prince and Princess of Wales returned to Britain on Saturday after a three-day US trip that combined messaging, friendship-politicking and symbolism accented with celebrity name-checks.
